title: 【立此存照】小学足球教练招聘要求——必须长得像姆巴佩
content:
近日，媒体工作者Matt Schrader（@tombschrader）在个人推特账号上贴出了一张在微信求职圈出现的招聘广告。招聘广告写道：

Men French native or non native needed in a primary school to teach football, Beijing location: Tai yang gong, Beijing.

北京小学招聘法国男子（原籍或非原籍均可）足球教练，地点：北京太阳宫。

Requirements: Must be black, strong and look like French football player MBAPPE.

要求：必须是黑人，身体强壮，且与法国足球运动员姆巴佩长相类似。

Benefits:  Salary: 20-26K; Accommodation allowance: 4K; Flight tickets for reimbursement: 10K annual; Visa is totally provided; insurance, visa provided…

薪酬福利：工资2-2.6万，住房补贴4千，机票报销1万/年，提供签证保险……

 

Seen in Wechat job recruiting group 😱 pic.twitter.com/OzX26PtXZS

— Matt Schrader (@tombschrader) July 17, 2018

也许，法国队在世界杯夺冠表现和小将姆巴佩的出色表现，即将在国内酝酿新一轮的足球热？媒体人Ray Kwong (@raykwong）指出：最近常被问道，“Mbappe怎么发音？”

“How do you pronounce Mbappe again” is a question I didn’t think I would have to ask today. https://t.co/SuAC8GxbsL

— Ray Kwong (@raykwong) July 17, 2018

但也有网友立即指出：这则招聘广告涉嫌种族歧视——且明目张胆！

Racial discrimination!

— Joe (@zzbar) July 17, 2018

Juuuuuuust a little bit

— Matt Schrader (@tombschrader) July 17, 2018
